description: Build AI-chatbots with support for live chat escalation, knowledge bases, or custom backend endpoints.

actions.name: create_chatbot
actions.description: Create and train a chatbot using custom data, medical models, or custom models. Training takes 1-2 minutes.

actions.name: delete_chatbot
actions.description: Delete a chatbot and all its associated data (training data, conversations, leads, etc.). This action is irreversible.

actions.name: retrain_chatbot
actions.description: Retrain an existing chatbot with new data or remove existing data (custom-data-upload model only)

actions.name: send_message
actions.description: Send messages to a chatbot and receive a response with support for streaming and OpenAI-compatible formats

actions.name: update_chatbot_settings
actions.description: Update comprehensive settings for a chatbot including name, prompts, behavior, and appearance

actions.name: upload_file
actions.description: Upload a file to be used with a chatbot for training or knowledge base
